title: Looking for good examples of Highlander in use
content: I’m looking for examples of Highlander in use. I quite like the typeface, and would like som ideas and examples. I think it can easily look a bit to childish and “hobbit”-ish. Can anyone help me?
author: alexfjelldal

comments.content: It is a nice typeface, and one that I haven’t seen used all that much. Maybe you can track the designer, and see if he/she has a personal website that may have some examples?
